text: Guelma () is the capital of Guelma Province and Guelma District. It is in northeastern Algeria, about from the Mediterranean coast. ==History== The town of Guelma was created in 1836; "Guelma," Encyclopedia Britannica; retrieved 2012-11-15. and the modern city was established in 1974.Universit√© 8 mai 1945 - Guelma, Ville de Guelma ; retrieved 2012-11-15. ==References== ==Other websites== * Office de Tourisme de Guelma Category:Cities in Algeria
title: Guelma
